attributes.action: examine the EU's external borders and international formation exchange systems - prevent "asylum shopping" as part of new anti - terror measures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current debate on anti - terror measures appears to focus more on British initiatives and interior Home Office measures, but less on what other European countries are doing. Can I suggest, that, in addition to your arguments, reported on AOL, that you look at utilising EC institutions more -which propose legislation, manage policy and enforce law - acting more in unison, than as a one party politicians as appears in the press.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
